author: Jane Porter
title: Terrance Ruth Announces Plan to Run for Raleigh Mayor This Fall
text: Raleigh voters will see a familiar name on their ballots this fall. [Terrance (Truth) Ruth](https://indyweek.com/news/wake/terrence-ruth-interview/), 41, a professor in NC State University’s School of Social Work and community activist, will run for mayor once again after narrowly losing to Mayor Mary-Ann Baldwin in the race for the office in 2022. “We will be prepared to face the challenges of tomorrow by inspiring Raleigh to make different choices today,” Ruth said in a press release announcing his candidacy dated March 14. “Our biggest challenges require long-term solutions. Long-term solutions are generated only when a city, not a small segment of a city, is invested in the process and the outcomes.” Ruth’s candidacy will focus on three principles: security, representation, and change, the press release continued. “Emphasizing the need for authentic leadership and innovative solutions, Dr. Ruth is committed to challenging the status quo and championing policies, prioritizing all Raleigh residents’ well-being,” the release stated. Ruth holds a Ph.D. in Public Affairs from the University of Central Florida and has worked as a teacher and principal in Wake County and as a nonprofit leader. Ruth is “deeply involved in local, state, and national social justice initiatives” and “leads coalitions to address local challenges through impact investing and creative collaborations, including projects to enhance affordable housing and innovate philanthropy,” according to the release. Ruth, who has not held elected office before, joins an already-crowded race for mayor. Raleigh city council member Corey Branch announced his candidacy this winter, as did former Raleigh council member, state senator, and NC treasurer [Janet Cowell](https://indyweek.com/news/wake/opportunities-and-wealth-for-some-and-displacement-and-burden-for-others-a-qa-with-raleigh-mayoral-candidate-janet-cowell/). Activist Delmonte Crawford, Republican mortgage broker Paul Fitts, and Peace University student James Shaughnessy IV have also announced their bids for the office. Mayor Mary-Ann Baldwin has not formally announced whether she will run for reelection but has said that she expects to. In 2022, Ruth received 41 percent of the vote to Baldwin’s 47 percent. Community advocate DaQuanta Copeland placed third with 10 percent of the vote. The candidate filing period opens July 5 and Election Day is November 5. All eight city council seats will be on the ballot. Follow Editor-in-Chief Jane Porter on [jporter@indyweek.com](mailto:jporter@indyweek.com).

persons.name: terrance ruth announces plan to run

organizations.name: nc state university’s school of social work

author: Noticias Caracol, Ana Sofía Boshell
title: Sentenciado a ejecución con nitrógeno en EE. UU. alega que lo tratan como un conejillo de indias - NoticiasCaracol
text: El estado de Alabama, en EE. UU., se dispone a aplicar en horas de la tarde de este jueves, 25 de enero, la pena capital a Kenneth Smith, quien lleva 35 años en la llamada fila de la muerte. La ejecución, ya de por sí polémica, ha causado muchas críticas pues utilizará un método que nunca se ha probado: asfixia con nitrógeno. El propio Smith hizo hoy un pedido de última hora para que se detenga. Kenneth Smith, de 58 años, fue declarado culpable del asesinato de una mujer de 45 años en 1988, ordenado por su esposo, un pastor muy endeudado e infiel, para que pareciera un robo que acabó mal. Pero lo que acabó mal fue el destino de Smith, que está a horas de ser ejecutado con gas nitrógeno, pese a que emprendió una batalla legal para impedir que muriera con este método nunca antes probado. Además, alega que está siendo tratado como un conejillo de indias. Ante su inminente muerte, son muchas las voces críticas de este método que se usa para matar cerdos después de ser anestesiados. La ONU es la principal voz en contra de las ejecuciones en general. “Esto podría constituir tortura u otros tratos o penas crueles, inhumanos o degradantes, según las normas internacionales de derechos humanos", indicó Ravina Shamdasani, portavoz de derechos humanos de la ONU. La ejecución está en la mira porque sus oponentes denuncian que puede provocar dolor excesivo en el proceso e incluso ser tortuoso. Publicidad “Es impresionante cómo el Estado tolera algo que es objetable como tortura. Así que no sé, si la máscara no se ajusta del todo bien y hay fugas de gas nitrógeno alrededor de la máscara o algo así, podría tardar más”, señaló el anestesiólogo Joel Zivot. La comunidad religiosa no se queda por fuera. Desde Sant’Egidio aseguraron que este tipo de pena de muerte es una prueba de fuego para la civilización actual que está perdiendo la batalla de una cultura de la vida. Mario Marazziti, representante de Sant’Egidio, enfatizó que este tipo de pena de muerte “rebaja a la humanidad al nivel de un estado que tiene un frenesí y una furia asesina contra un individuo, tratando de matarlo dos veces después de una terrible ejecución fallida que duró cuatro horas”. Publicidad En todo caso, la ejecución está programada para este jueves a las 6 p. m. hora local. Y solo un hecho extraordinario podría cambiar el destino de Kenneth Smith.

text: Making Land Ownership a Reality Online Land Sales LLC, established in 2004, is on a mission to make land ownership more accessible and meaningful to people across the United States. More information can be found at https://store.onlinelandsales.com . As the needs of their customers evolve, Online Land Sales is committed to adapting and serving them better. They understand that purchasing land is a significant decision, and they are dedicated to ensuring that every customer's experience is exceptional. A Seamless Experience Online Land Sales LLC doesn't just sell land; they offer a seamless experience. They understand that buying land involves more than just acquiring a plot; it's about realizing a dream. That's why they provide financing options to make land ownership achievable for more people. Their user-friendly platform allows you to browse, select, and purchase land with ease. Properties That Inspire Online Land Sales features an assortment of properties that inspire and captivate. From vast acreages in Nevada to charming lots in Kentucky and Missouri, there's a piece of land for every dreamer. Whether you're looking to build your dream home, embark on an investment journey, or find a tranquil retreat, Online Land Sales has the land you've been searching for. Customer Satisfaction Guaranteed Online Land Sales LLC's commitment to customer satisfaction is unwavering. They believe that buying land should be a gratifying experience, and they go the extra mile to ensure it is. Their properties are handpicked and thoroughly vetted to meet the highest standards, giving you peace of mind as you embark on your landownership journey. Get in Touch with Online Land Sales If you're ready to explore the world of landownership or have questions about specific properties, Online Land Sales LLC is here to assist you. Their dedicated team is just a phone call or email away, ready to provide you with the information you need to make an informed decision. About Online Land Sales LLC Founded in 2004, Online Land Sales LLC has been a pioneer in offering accessible land ownership opportunities. Their dedication to delivering value to customers, their commitment to transparency, and their innovative approach have set them apart in the industry. As they look ahead to the future, Online Land Sales LLC is poised to continue adding meaning to the lives of landowners and dreamers across the United States. Visit https://store.onlinelandsales.com for more details. FAQs (Frequently Asked Questions) 1. What is the mission of Online Land Sales LLC? Whether you're looking for an investment opportunity, a future building site, or a peaceful retreat, they have properties to suit various dreams and goals. 4. author: @agenciabrasil
title: Dorival Júnior quer a seleção atuando bem independente do adversário | Agência Brasil
text:
Esportes
Dorival Júnior quer a seleção atuando bem independente do adversário
O técnico Dorival Júnior afirmou que espera ver a seleção brasileira atuando bem diante de qualquer adversário. A declaração foi dada em entrevista coletiva concedida nesta quarta-feira (19), um dia antes da partida contra a Colômbia, válida pela 13ª rodada das Eliminatórias Sul-Americanas para a Copa do Mundo de 2026.
“Quero ver a seleção render em qualquer momento, independentemente do adversário que tenhamos. Teremos dois compromissos muito complicados [contra a Colômbia e a Argentina], mas nossos adversários também reconhecem a condição da seleção brasileira. Estamos melhorando a cada momento, é uma subida gradativa que está acontecendo”, declarou o treinador.
Diante da equipe colombiana Dorival Júnior espera uma partida complicada e disputada: “A Colômbia tem uma estrutura de jogo muito bem definida, são 30 jogos do treinador, os jogadores já muito bem definidos em suas funções e posições. Com certeza teremos um jogo muito complicado, jogado, porque é uma equipe que joga e propõe e busca variações”.
Neste compromisso, que será realizado a partir das 21h45 (horário de Brasília) da próxima quinta-feira (20) no estádio Mané Garrincha, em Brasília, o técnico Dorival Júnior pode optar por algumas novidades na equipe titular. Uma delas pode ser a entrada de João Pedro na posição de centroavante.
“É um jogo importante [contra a Colômbia], dentro da nossa casa, contra uma grande seleção. Acho que temos que focar essa semana, fazer um grande trabalho, para apresentar um bom futebol e poder vencer a partida”, declarou o jogador de 23 anos de idade formado no Fluminense e que atualmente defende o Brighton (Inglaterra).
Uma possível escalação da seleção brasileira para o jogo com a Colômbia é: Alisson; Vanderson, Marquinhos, Gabriel Magalhães e Guilherme Arana; Bruno Guimarães e Gerson; Rodrygo, Raphinha e Vinicius Júnior; João Pedro.
Esportes
Dorival Júnior quer a seleção atuando bem independente do adversário

author: Rob Garguilo
title: Comet C/2023 A3 Seen Across The Skies Of South Florida | NewsRadio WIOD | Florida News
text:
Photo: Trifonov_Evgeniy / iStock / Getty Images
Brevard County, FL - A rare celestial event is unfolding in our night sky. Comet C/2023 A3 (Tsuchinshan-ATLAS) is currently making a once-in-a-lifetime pass by the Sun and is visible to the naked eye for a limited time.
While the comet was initially visible in the morning sky, its path has brought it to the evening sky, making it observable in the west shortly after sunset.
Despite its recent social media buzz, many are still unsure how to spot this celestial wonder.
To spot the comet, look to the western sky just after sunset for the next few nights.
Ensure you have a clear view of the western horizon and allow your eyes to adjust to the darkness.
While a telescope or expensive equipment is not necessary, strong eyesight is recommended. However, simple sporting binoculars can aid in viewing the comet and its faint tail.
For those with smartphones, using the night shot setting on your camera can help capture the comet.
This setting takes a longer exposure, gathering more light and revealing details not visible to the naked eye.
The comet will be visible in the western sky at the following times:
Tonight (Thursday): 7:07 PM Friday: 7:21 PM Saturday: 7:20 PM Sunday: 7:19 PM Monday: 7:18 PM As the comet continues its journey away from the Sun, it will become dimmer each night. Therefore, now is the ideal time to observe this extraordinary celestial event before it fades from our view.
